meanings.definition: To remove toxic substances from the body.
meanings.sent1: After eating unhealthy food, it is important to detoxify your body by drinking plenty of water.
meanings.sent2: The liver helps detoxify the body by filtering out harmful substances.
meanings.sent3: I tried to detoxify my body by eating only green vegetables for a week, but I missed pizza too much.
meanings.sent4: Herbal tea can help detoxify your system, leaving you feeling refreshed and energized.
meanings.sent5: The spa offers a special treatment to detoxify your skin and leave it glowing.

meanings.definition: To cleanse or purify something by removing harmful substances.
meanings.sent1: To maintain a healthy environment, it is essential to detoxify the water in the fish tank regularly.
meanings.sent2: The air purifier works to detoxify the air in the room by removing pollutants and allergens.
meanings.sent3: She decided to detoxify her wardrobe by donating clothes she no longer wore.
meanings.sent4: The charity organization's mission is to detoxify the community by cleaning up litter and pollution.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise can help detoxify your mind and improve mental clarity.
